paper_title.ja: 鋼繊維補強舗装用転圧コンクリートの配合と基礎物性の検討
paper_title.en: A STUDY ON MIX PROPORTIONS AND PROPERTIES OF STEEL FIBER REINFORCED ROLLER COMPACTED CONCRETE FOR PAVEMENTS

description.ja: インデント加工した鋼繊維および両端フック付きの鋼繊維を舗装用転圧コンクリートに混入したときの所要の修正VC値を得るための単位水量, 細骨材率および鋼繊維混入率を明らかにし, 高性能AE減水剤による減水程度および適切な添加率を明らかにした. また, 材料分離程度が無混入の場合より小さくなること, 配向角が転圧により水平に近づくため補強効果が上がること, 曲げ強度および曲げ靱性係数が向上すること, ならびに摩耗アスファルト舗装版上へのオーバーレイを想定した材齢7日の付着強度は無混入の場合と同程度であることを明らかにした. 最後に, 凍結融解抵抗性が改善されること, 単位水量は増加するが, 乾燥収縮は無混入の場合と同程度となることを明らかにした.
description.en: The indented type and hooked type steel fibers were selected for roller compacted concrete for pavements. The appropriate unit water content, sand percentage, reinforcement amount were found out, and water reduction degree by incorporating superplasticizer and its appropriate adding percentage by cement content were chosen for a given consistency which was evaluated by the vibrating compaction value measured by a Swedish-type Vebe apparatus. The segregation degree was reduced by using steel fiber, and the fiber angle in the concrete tended to approach the horizontal angle by compaction used surface vibrator. The flexural strength, ductility and frost resistance were improved, and bond strength between the concrete and abraised asphalt pavement surface was evaluated at the age of 7 days. The drying shrinkage was almost the same as the non-fiber roller compacted concrete regardless of increase in the unit water content for a given consistency.

publisher.ja: 公益社団法人 土木学会

description.en: The indented type and hooked type steel fibers were selected for roller compacted concrete for pavements. The appropriate unit water content, sand percentage, reinforcement amount were found out, and water reduction degree by incorporating superplasticizer and its appropriate adding percentage by cement content were chosen for a given consistency which was evaluated by the vibrating compaction value measured by a Swedish-type Vebe apparatus. The segregation degree was reduced by using steel fiber, and the fiber angle in the concrete tended to approach the horizontal angle by compaction used surface vibrator. The flexural strength, ductility and frost resistance were improved, and bond strength between the concrete and abraised asphalt pavement surface was evaluated at the age of 7 days. The drying shrinkage was almost the same as the non-fiber roller compacted concrete regardless of increase in the unit water content for a given consistency.

paper_title.ja: 舗装用転圧コンクリートの締固め程度に及ぼす振動加速度および地盤係数の影響
paper_title.en: EFFECT OF VARYING ACCELERATION RESPONSE OF COMPACTION MACHINE AND COEFFICIENT OF SUBGRADE REACTION ON COMPACTION DEGREE OF ROLLER COMPACTED CONCRETE FOR PAVEMENT

description.ja: 舗装用転圧コンクリートの室内および現場締固め実験において, 締固め機械の振動加速度を測定し, その周波数分析により加速度波形の乱れ度を評価した. この乱れ度は, 締固め時間の経過に伴って減少し, その後一定値に漸近すること, また, 路盤の地盤係数を一定としたとき, 修正VC値の減少に伴い減少し, さらに締固め程度, 圧縮および曲げ強度比およびRIカウント数の増加に伴い減少することから締固めの進行程度を示す指標になり得ることを明らかにした. そして, 締固め程度が特定値になるときの乱れ度は, 室内および現場実験とも地盤係数の増加に伴って増加する同一曲線上にあることを示した.
description.en: The disturbance degree of an acceleration wave measured on the compaction machine was evaluated by the frequency analysis. This disturbance degree decreased gradually with elapsed compaction time and then approached a constant value. The degree decreased with a decrease in the vibrating compaction value measured by a Swedish-type Vebe apparatus and with an increase in the compaction ratio, compressive and bending strength ratio and indicated number of radio-isotope density gauge in the case of compacting the concrete on the subbase with a given coefficient of subgrade reaction. From these results, it was clarified that the disturbance degree was an index to indicate progressing compaction condition. The degree measured in the both cases of laboratory and situ was pointed on the same increasing curve with an increase in the coefficient of subgrade reaction at a specified compaction ratio.

description.en: The disturbance degree of an acceleration wave measured on the compaction machine was evaluated by the frequency analysis. This disturbance degree decreased gradually with elapsed compaction time and then approached a constant value. The degree decreased with a decrease in the vibrating compaction value measured by a Swedish-type Vebe apparatus and with an increase in the compaction ratio, compressive and bending strength ratio and indicated number of radio-isotope density gauge in the case of compacting the concrete on the subbase with a given coefficient of subgrade reaction. From these results, it was clarified that the disturbance degree was an index to indicate progressing compaction condition. The degree measured in the both cases of laboratory and situ was pointed on the same increasing curve with an increase in the coefficient of subgrade reaction at a specified compaction ratio.

paper_title.en: Fundamental Studies on Prepacked and Postpacked Concrete Using Recycled Coause Aggregate.
Properties of concrete using lapilli as coarse aggregate

description.en: The properties of lapilli as coarse aggregate were used to study the basic properties of concrete. The concrete weight was almost the same as that of grade 2 lightweight concrete and the 28-day compressive and flexural strengths were 105 and 23.8 kgf/cm2. The 24 hr absorption and drying weight loss percentage were much greater than the gravel aggregate concretes which has 60% thermal conductivity. Flexural strength reduction by the washed finish was only about 5%.
